title: Giratina

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Outrage** - Deal a Basic Attack at your target.
**Will o Wisp** - Lower a target's Attack Value down to None for the night. 3 uses.
**Roar** - Choose a target. All of their visitors are redirected to you. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -You are forced to use **Outrage** the night after you use **Outrage**  You are no longer forced to use **Outrage** if you have used It 2 times in a row already.

fields.name: Pokémon Ability:
fields.value: **Telepathy** Any attack dealt towards you done by a member of the Pokémon Faction (due to redirection and similar) Is lowered to None.

desc:
Post 908
*The world is saved. Giratina is gone. Now time to get back to my gym badges!*
